verses.verse: <S%H199>"However<s%> now, <S%H347>Job,<s%> <S%H4994>please<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H4405>speech,<s%> And <S%H238>listen<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H1697>words.<s%>
<S%H2009>"Behold<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> I <S%H6605>open<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> My <S%H3956>tongue<s%> in my <S%H2441>mouth<s%> <S%H1696>speaks.<s%>
"My <S%H561>words<s%> are [from] the <S%H3476>uprightness<s%> of my <S%H3820>heart;<s%> And my <S%H8193>lips<s%> <S%H4448>speak<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> <S%H1305>sincerely.<s%>
"The <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%> has <S%H6213>made<s%> me, And the <S%H5397>breath<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H2421>gives<s%> me <S%H2421>life.<s%>
<S%H7725>"Refute<s%> me <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H3201>can;<s%> <S%H6186>Array<s%> yourselves <S%H6440>before<s%> me, <S%H3320>take<s%> your <S%H3320>stand.<s%>
<S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> I belong to <S%H410>God<s%> like you; I <S%H1571>too<s%> have been <S%H7169>formed<s%> out of the <S%H2563>clay.<s%>
<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H367>fear<s%> of me should <S%H1204>terrify<s%> you, <S%H3808>Nor<s%> should my <S%H405>pressure<s%> <S%H3513>weigh<s%> <S%H3513>heavily<s%> on you.
<S%H389>"Surely<s%> you have <S%H559>spoken<s%> in my <S%H241>hearing,<s%> And I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of [your] words: <S%H4405><s%>
'I am <S%H2134>pure,<s%> <S%H1097>without<s%> <S%H6588>transgression;<s%> I am <S%H2643>innocent<s%> and there is <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5771>guilt<s%> in me.
<S%H2005>'Behold,<s%> He <S%H4672>invents<s%> <S%H8569>pretexts<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me; He <S%H2803>counts<s%> me as His <S%H340>enemy.<s%>
'He <S%H7760>puts<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> in the <S%H5465>stocks;<s%> He <S%H8104>watches<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H734>paths.<s%>'
<S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> let me <S%H6030>tell<s%> you, you are not <S%H6663>right<s%> in <S%H384>this,<s%> For <S%H433>God<s%> is <S%H7235>greater<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H582>man.<s%>
<S%H4069>"Why<s%> do you <S%H7378>complain<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> Him, That He does not <S%H6030>give<s%> an <S%H6030>account<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> His <S%H1697>doings<s%>?
<S%H3588>"Indeed<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H1696>speaks<s%> <S%H259>once,<s%> Or <S%H8147>twice,<s%> [yet] <S%H3808>no<s%> one <S%H7789>notices<s%> it.

"In a <S%H2472>dream,<s%> a <S%H2384>vision<s%> of the <S%H3915>night,<s%> When <S%H8639>sound<s%> <S%H8639>sleep<s%> <S%H5307>falls<s%> on <S%H376>men,<s%> While they <S%H8572>slumber<s%> in their <S%H4904>beds,<s%>
<S%H227>Then<s%> He <S%H1540>opens<s%> the <S%H241>ears<s%> of <S%H376>men,<s%> And <S%H2856>seals<s%> their <S%H4148>instruction,<s%>
That He may <S%H5493>turn<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H5493>aside<s%> [from his] <S%H4639>conduct,<s%> And <S%H3680>keep<s%> <S%H1397>man<s%> from <S%H1466>pride;<s%>
He <S%H2820>keeps<s%> <S%H2820>back<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H7845>pit,<s%> And his <S%H9130>life<s%> from <S%H5674>passing<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> into <S%H7973>Sheol.<s%>
"Man is also <S%H3198>chastened<s%> with <S%H4341>pain<s%> on his <S%H4904>bed,<s%> And with <S%H386>unceasing<s%> <S%H7379>complaint<s%> in his <S%H6106>bones;<s%>
So that his <S%H9130>life<s%> <S%H2092>loathes<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> And his <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H8378>favorite<s%> <S%H3978>food.<s%>
"His <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H3615>wastes<s%> <S%H3615>away<s%> from <S%H7210>sight,<s%> And his <S%H6106>bones<s%> which were not <S%H7210>seen<s%> <S%H8192>stick<s%> out.
"Then his <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H7126>draws<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> to the <S%H7845>pit,<s%> And his <S%H9130>life<s%> to those who <S%H4191>bring<s%> <S%H4191>death.<s%>

<S%H518>"If<s%> <S%H3426>there<s%> is an <S%H4397>angel<s%> [as] <S%H9238>mediator<s%> for him, <S%H259>One<s%> out of a <S%H505>thousand,<s%> To <S%H5046>remind<s%> a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H3477>what<s%> is <S%H3476>right<s%> for him,

Then let him be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to him, and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H6308>'Deliver<s%> him from <S%H3381>going<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H7845>pit,<s%> I have <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H3724>ransom<s%>';

Let his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H7375>become<s%> <S%H7375>fresher<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> in <S%H5290>youth,<s%> Let him <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H5934>youthful<s%> <S%H5934>vigor;<s%>

Then he will <S%H6279>pray<s%> to <S%H433>God,<s%> and He will <S%H7521>accept<s%> him, That he may <S%H7200>see<s%> His <S%H6440>face<s%> with <S%H8643>joy,<s%> And He may <S%H7725>restore<s%> His <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> to <S%H582>man.<s%>

"He will <S%H7891>sing<s%> to <S%H376>men<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> 'I have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> and <S%H9389>perverted<s%> <S%H3477>what<s%> is <S%H3474>right,<s%> And it is not <S%H9586>proper<s%> for me.
'He has <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from <S%H5674>going<s%> to the <S%H7845>pit,<s%> And my <S%H9130>life<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H216>light.<s%>'
<S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H6466>does<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H6471>oftentimes<s%> <S%H7969><s%> with <S%H1397>men,<s%>
To <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H7845>pit,<s%> That he may be <S%H215>enlightened<s%> with the <S%H216>light<s%> of <S%H9132>life.<s%>
<S%H7181>"Pay<s%> <S%H7181>attention,<s%> O <S%H347>Job,<s%> <S%H8085>listen<s%> to me; <S%H2790>Keep<s%> <S%H2790>silent<s%> and let me <S%H1696>speak.<s%>
"[Then] <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H3426>have<s%> <S%H4405>anything<s%> to <S%H4405>say,<s%> <S%H7725>answer<s%> me; <S%H1696>Speak,<s%> for I <S%H2654>desire<s%> to <S%H6663>justify<s%> you.
<S%H518>"If<s%> not, <S%H8085>listen<s%> to me; <S%H2790>Keep<s%> <S%H2790>silent,<s%> and I will <S%H502>teach<s%> you <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%>"
